org.mmbase.applications.vprowizards.spring

Class BasicCommandFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mmbase.applications.vprowizards.spring.BasicCommandFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CommandFactory

    public class BasicCommandFactory
extends Object
implements CommandFactory
    This class will create an instance of BasicCommand and set the action classes on it. It uses a given ActionMappingResolver instance to resolve what name to map the action to, or how the actions wille be accesible through the requests.
    Author:
    ebunders
